title: Maxar executive renews warning that budget cuts threaten commercial remote-sensing industry
summary: A Maxar Intelligence executive warns that proposed U.S. government budget cuts for commercial satellite imagery procurement could undermine battlefield operations and industry progress. The industry, including companies like ICEYE US, Maxar, Planet, and BlackSky, is urging lawmakers to restore funding to maintain commercial remote-sensing capabilities.
why_it_matters: The article highlights industry concerns over potential budget cuts to commercial satellite imagery procurement, which could impact national security operations and the viability of commercial remote-sensing firms. It underscores the reliance of the U.S. government on commercial providers for timely and cost-effective imagery.
